title: Intensive Care Unit Bronchoscopy Simulation Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic respiratory anatomy and critical care nursing knowledge
context.additional_context: Provision of practical training environments utilizing medical simulation equipment and virtual reality (VR) platforms

learning_goals: Participants can explain bronchoscopy procedures step-by-step in an intensive care unit environment
Participants perform bronchoscope insertion and airway structure verification with 80% accuracy using simulation equipment
Participants identify possible complications (e.g., bleeding, airway injury) during procedures and document appropriate response protocols
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
